New clone/duplicate feature. Do you ever feel like you need to rank the same character/artifact in 2 different tiers? Now you can! Right click a character or artifact and select "Clone element" from the contextual menu. Now you can move the new element anywhere you wish. Clones can have different skins equiped and different comments. To delete a duplicated element right click the clone and select "Delete clone", this option won't appear on the original element.
